title: Workshop on Online English Education Content Quality Evaluation Methods

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience using online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Aims to strengthen the capacity for evaluating educational content quality based on the experience of a sudden transition to online learning due to COVID-19.

learning_goals: Students can explain criteria for evaluating the quality of online English content across five domains: physical design, affective design, cognitive design, flexibility, and ease of use
Students can measure and analyze the quality of actual educational content using survey-based evaluation tools
Students can provide specific feedback for content improvement based on evaluation results

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
